ComicInfo.Title: Darkness Falls on Gotham
ComicInfo.Summary: Darkness Falls on Gotham: The Justice League battles against Batman and Green Arrow, whom they believe have been turned in vampires, unaware that it is really Wonder Woman and Green Lantern who have been turned. Meanwhile, the Suicide Squad goes after the Joker who has been turned into a vampire, but they find that some of their team have also been turned.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 00:33:52. [CVDB908832] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:26. [Issue ID 2356477]
